title: League made me get a new password.
body: I tried logging  in and was told that it wasn't the correct match but I haven't changed it since I started playing. I used the account forgot password thing to create a new password. Maybe my old one was too weak and Riot changed how the passwords work but I don't know. Why was my password not accepted and why did I have to make a new one?

replies.body:
It's possible someone may have accessed your account without your permission. I'd recommend looking through your account to ensure that isn't the case. Check out our [**Protecting your Account Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) for steps you can take to ensure your account is safe against those who wish to access it without your permission!

If you have any questions, let me know.
I would be scared if i were you.
